location: near World Cup Square, Pipliyahana, Indore, Madhya Pradesh 452016

dining.name: Blue Salt and Coffee
dining.description: indulge in a superb all-day dining experience, featuring a thoughtfully curated multi-cuisine menu to suit every palate. Open around the clock, our multi-cuisine restaurant in Indore is an elegant venue that offers both à la carte and buffet options, ensuring the perfect meal at any hour. Set against the serene backdrop of lush gardens and pool views, the fine dining experience is further elevated by an impressive selection of premium alcoholic beverages, adding the perfect finishing touch to your meal.
